item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称，尽管大选大跌，法国银行依然稳健
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，尽管埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）总统要求举行临时大选引发了投资者抛售，但法国银行仍然保持稳健。【原文：French banks remain solid — despite the investor selloff triggered when President Emmanuel Macron called snap elections — according to central-bank chief Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡将于本周启动下一轮投资者会谈
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，斯里兰卡官员和全球投资者预计将于本周举行第二轮直接会谈，就 120 亿美元违约债券的重组问题达成一致。【原文：Sri Lankan officials and global investors are expected to hold a second round of direct talks this week to agree on the restructuring of $12 billion in defaulted bonds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 随着政治风向的转变，加拿大央行将解释其大流行病行动
item.description: 加拿大央行正在对其大流行病时期的政策进行正式审查，当时央行购买了数千亿政府债券以压低利率。这可能是加拿大央行行长蒂夫-麦克尔姆（Tiff Macklem）在他最激烈的批评者之一上台之前解释自己的最后机会。【原文：The Bank of Canada is doing a formal review of its pandemic-era policies, when it bought hundreds of billions in government bonds to suppress interest rates. It may represent a last chance for Governor Tiff Macklem to explain himself before one of his fiercest critics comes to power.】

item.title: 墨西哥 6 月初通胀加速超过预期
item.description: 墨西哥 6 月初的通胀加速超过预期，进一步高于央行的目标，这可能会巩固墨西哥银行在周四利率会议上连续第二次暂停的决定。【原文：Mexico’s inflation accelerated more than expected in early June to move further above the central bank’s target, likely cementing a second straight pause by Banco de Mexico at its Thursday rate meeting.】

item.title: 马萨诸塞州试图阻止房地产投资信托基金拥有医院
item.description: Steward 医疗保健系统的倒闭让马萨诸塞州的立法者们将矛头指向了医院运营商的房东和其他类似公司。房地产专家表示，他们提出的解决方案失之偏颇。【原文：The collapse of Steward Health Care System has Massachusetts lawmakers pointing fingers at the hospital operator’s landlord and other companies like it. Real estate experts say their proposed fixes miss the mark.】

item.title: 加拿大廉价石油取代伊拉克对美国西海岸的进口
item.description: 由于新扩建的跨山输油管道重新调整了太平洋地区的贸易流，美国西海岸的炼油厂正在用来自加拿大的廉价原油取代伊拉克的重油进口。【原文：US West Coast refiners are replacing their heavy Iraqi oil imports with cheaper crude from Canada as the newly expanded Trans Mountain pipeline reshuffles trade flows across the Pacific.】

item.title: 伦敦二战隧道开发商将在阿姆斯特丹上市
item.description: 一家计划在伦敦重建二战时期隧道的公司将于本周在阿姆斯特丹上市，而不是原定的英国首都。【原文：A company planning to redevelop World War II-era tunnels in London will list its shares in Amsterdam this week, rather than its originally intended venue of the UK capital.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮推高权力挤压风险
item.description:
美国的一些枢纽中心已经面临电力供应不足的挑战。【原文：

Some US hubs are already facing challenges in delivering enough electricity.

】

item.title: 瑞银选择北京而非花旗证券收购瑞士信贷部门
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）已同意将其在瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）中国企业中的大部分股份出售给一家北京支持的基金，这对肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的花旗证券（Citadel Securities）在世界第二大经济体扩张的雄心造成了打击。【原文：UBS Group AG has agreed to sell the majority of its stake in Credit Suisse’s China venture to a Beijing-backed fund, dealing a blow to the ambitions of Ken Griffin’s Citadel Securities to expand in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 据路透社报道，申银万国已秘密申请在伦敦上市
item.description: 据路透社援引两位消息人士的话报道，在线时尚零售商 Shein 已向英国市场监管机构秘密提交了可能在伦敦上市的文件。【原文：Online fashion retailer Shein has confidentially filed papers for a potential listing in London with Britain’s market regulator, Reuters reported, citing two sources.】

item.title: 泰国提高税收减免、减少禁锢措施以提振股市
item.description: 泰国将提高 ESG 基金持有人的免税额，并缩短锁定期，以此来支持因外国投资者外流而受到冲击的当地股票市场。【原文：Thailand will raise tax allowance and trim lock-up periods for holders of ESG-focused funds as part of efforts to bolster the local equity market hit by foreign investor exodus.】

item.title: 詹恩融资 53 亿美元，创 2018 年以来最大对冲基金首秀
item.description: Bobby Jain 已为他新成立的多策略对冲基金募集到 53 亿美元，这是自 ExodusPoint 资本管理公司创纪录地首次亮相以来募集资金最多的一次。【原文：Bobby Jain has gathered $5.3 billion in commitments for his new multistrategy hedge fund, marking the biggest fundraising haul since ExodusPoint Capital Management’s record debut.】

item.title: 加密货币 "阿尔特币 "寒冬提前到来，解锁刺激部分投资者退出
item.description: 一些初始投资者和创始人在各种项目中的抛售行为似乎正在帮助雪崩币、DYDX 和PYTH 等被称为 "另类币 "的数字代币提前迎来 "加密冬天"。【原文：Selling by some initial investors and founders in various projects appears to be helping to bring on an early “crypto winter” for digital tokens such as Avalanche, DYDX and PYTH that are dubbed altcoins.】

item.title: 中国为德国汽车制造商提供补贴以防止征收电动汽车税
item.description: 中国政府表示，如果柏林说服欧盟降低对中国电动汽车出口的关税，德国的豪华汽车制造商将从中受益。【原文：Beijing has suggested Germany’s luxury car manufacturers could benefit if Berlin convinces the European Union to drop tariffs on Chinese electric-vehicle exports.】

item.title: 据说 GIP、Snam 正在酝酿退出价值 210 亿美元的 Adnoc 天然气管道部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，全球基础设施合伙公司（Global Infrastructure Partners）和意大利斯南公司（Snam SpA）正在考虑出售其在阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：Global Infrastructure Partners and Italy’s Snam SpA are considering a potential sale of their stakes in Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.’s gas pipeline unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。市场平稳，股市可能已经见顶，债券市场发出信号，加密货币下跌。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Steady markets, stocks may have peaked, bond market signals and crypto declines. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: Coatue 投资比特币矿工 Hut 8，行业加入人工智能竞赛
item.description: 亿万富翁菲利普-拉丰（Philippe Laffont）的Coatue Management公司是最近一家押注加密货币采矿业人工智能转型的公司。【原文：Billionaire Philippe Laffont’s Coatue Management is the latest firm to bet on the artificial intelligence transition in the crypto-mining industry.】

item.title: 索诺科公司以 39 亿美元从 KPS 收购包装公司 Eviosys
item.description: Sonoco Products Co. 同意以约 39 亿美元的价格从 KPS Capital Partners 手中收购易拉罐和其他包装生产商 Eviosys。【原文：Sonoco Products Co. agreed to buy Eviosys, a maker of cans and other packaging, from KPS Capital Partners for about $3.9 billion.】

item.title: 移民之争凸显瑞士对外籍员工的依赖
item.description: 在欧盟就移民和人员自由流动问题展开政治斗争之际，瑞士政府发布的一份报告称，瑞士企业因能够轻松聘用外籍员工而受益匪浅。【原文：Swiss businesses have benefited from being able to easily tap foreign workers, according to a government report published amid political fighting over immigration and free movement of people from the European Union.】

item.title: 纳格尔称数字欧元持有期限尚无定论
item.description: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，目前还不清楚消费者对潜在数字欧元的持有限额。【原文：Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said it’s still unclear what consumers’ holding limits for the potential digital euro should be.】

item.title: 勒庞极右翼政党在民调上升中表示准备执政
item.description: 国民公投党领导人乔丹-巴尔德拉（Jordan Bardella）在周日大选前的民调中进一步领先，他试图向法国选民保证，他在监管欧盟第二大经济体方面是值得信赖的。【原文：National Rally leader Jordan Bardella sought to assure French voters that he can be trusted overseeing the European Union’s second-largest economy as his party made further gains in the polls ahead of Sunday’s election.】

item.title: 印度考虑降低小麦进口税以抑制价格上涨
item.description: 由于供应日益紧张，印度正在考虑对小麦进口进行罕见的减税，以控制价格。【原文：India is considering a rare tax cut on wheat imports to keep prices in check as supplies are getting tighter.】

item.title: 债权国准备给予埃塞俄比亚更多时间谈判国际货币基金组织协议
item.description: 据一位直接了解会谈情况的人士称，埃塞俄比亚的官方债权人准备延长该国与国际货币基金组织就新计划达成协议的 6 月 30 日最后期限。【原文：Ethiopia’s official creditors are ready to extend a June 30 deadline for the country to reach a deal with the International Monetary Fund on a new program, according to a person with direct knowledge of the talks.】

item.title: 加纳就债券改革达成协议，投资者损失 37
item.description: 国际债权人委员会顾问和加纳政府表示，加纳与欧元债券投资者就约 130 亿美元的债务重组达成了原则性协议。【原文：Ghana reached an agreement in principle with eurobond investors to restructure about $13 billion of debt, the advisers to an international creditor committee and the government said.】

item.title: 瑞典政府宣布抗击通货膨胀取得胜利
item.description: 瑞典政府准备放弃旨在抑制物价上涨的财政政策，因为它认为有更大的空间来支持失业率上升和国内需求疲软的经济。【原文：Sweden’s government is ready to move away from a fiscal policy designed to hold back price increases as it sees more scope for supporting an economy that is marked by rising unemployment and weak domestic demand.】

item.title: 据说 AirTrunk 的所有者将寻求现有贷款人的豁免权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，目前正在待售的澳大利亚数据中心运营商 AirTrunk 的所有者计划要求贷款人放弃该公司贷款中的一项条款，即如果该公司被出售，就必须对债务进行再融资。【原文：The owners of AirTrunk, an Australian data center operator currently up for sale, plan to ask lenders to waive a clause in the company’s loans that would force it to refinance the debt if the firm is sold, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国企业预期下降，复苏希望受挫
item.description: 德国的商业前景五个月来首次出现下滑，这表明欧洲最大经济体的逐步复苏面临逆风。【原文：Germany’s business outlook declined for the first time in five months — a sign that the gradual recovery in Europe’s biggest economy faces headwinds.】

item.title: 人民币升值压力增大，交易再次出现中断
item.description: 人民币兑美元汇率正在向其允许交易区间的弱势边缘冲击，某些结算日期较短的货币交易再次受到影响。【原文：The yuan is bumping up against the weak edge of its allowed trading range against the dollar, and once again, certain currency transactions with shorter settlement dates are being affected.】

item.title: 为什么汤姆-李认为我们可能在 2030 年看到 S&P 达到 15,000 美元？
item.description:
Fundstrat创始人揭示了他对目标的看法。【原文：

The Fundstrat founder reveals how he thinks about targets.

】

item.title: 欧陆芬斯在浑水公司披露空头头寸后下挫
item.description: 欧陆科学公司（Eurofins Scientific SE）被卡森-布洛克（Carson Block）的浑水研究公司（Muddy Waters Research）盯上后，创下二十多年来的最大跌幅。【原文：Eurofins Scientific SE plunged the most in more than two decades after the laboratory-testing company was targeted by Carson Block’s Muddy Waters Research.】
